directives.name: import
directives.description: Imports and renders another EJB template file.

directives.name: component
directives.description: Renders a template as a component, allowing for slots.

directives.name: stack
directives.description: Retrieves and renders a named stack of content.

directives.name: push
directives.description: Pushes content into a named stack.

directives.name: defined
directives.description: Retrieves and renders a named defined block.

directives.name: define
directives.description: Defines a reusable block of content.

directives.name: code
directives.description: Executes raw JavaScript code on the server side.

directives.name: if
directives.description: Conditionally renders a block of code.

parents.name: elseif
parents.description: An alternative condition for an @if block.

parents.name: else
parents.description: The default case for an @if block.

directives.name: for
directives.description: Repeats a block of code for each item in an array.

directives.name: isset
directives.description: Checks if a variable is defined and not null, then prints it.

directives.name: switch
directives.description: A control structure that allows checking a variable against multiple values.

parents.name: default
parents.description: The default case for a @switch block.

directives.name: once
directives.description: Ensures a block of code is rendered only once, even if included multiple times.
